topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: Ginipad
short_description: It's a complete IDE for Java, written in Java itself. Designed to provide an high functional level in a simple and natural way, it provides: Syntax Highlight, Automatic Code completition, Customization, very short learning time.
